name: Newton Defence
description:
A weird little tower defence game inspired by Newton's Cradle. Unfortunately, physics never quite works out how you want so the pendulums can swing quite unpredictably. Use the mouse and drag to aim the pendulums or build new ones protect the olde tree for as long as you can!

George Mak - Programming and (the terrible) Design
@dinopokey

Oab - Programming
@Im_Oab

Ben Lilley - Programming
Kevin Huang - Art

Made for Global Game Jam 2017. The theme was Waves.
